documentation.text: Remove old commits from storage, where the commit's timestamp is older than block.timestamp - REVEAL_MAX_DELAY. The purpose is to remove dangling data from blockchain, and prevent commits grow unbounded. This is executed at commit time. The committer pays for the gas of this cleanup. Therefore, any attacker who intend to spam commits would be disincentivized. The attacker would not succeed in preventing any normal operation by the user.
we will slowly move commit-reveal related stuff from ONEWallet to here

documentation.text: Remove old commits from storage, where the commit's timestamp is older than block.timestamp - REVEAL_MAX_DELAY. The purpose is to remove dangling data from blockchain, and prevent commits grow unbounded. This is executed at commit time. The committer pays for the gas of this cleanup. Therefore, any attacker who intend to spam commits would be disincentivized. The attacker would not succeed in preventing any normal operation by the user.

cleanupCommits(CommitManager.CommitState.notice: Remove old commits from storage, where the commit's timestamp is older than block.timestamp - REVEAL_MAX_DELAY. The purpose is to remove dangling data from blockchain, and prevent commits grow unbounded. This is executed at commit time. The committer pays for the gas of this cleanup. Therefore, any attacker who intend to spam commits would be disincentivized. The attacker would not succeed in preventing any normal operation by the user.
